item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1321; 05:26PM; 7635 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B8K05S; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. The fire extended into one adjacent unit prior to knockdown. One adult female was transported for burn injuries in *at least* serious condition. No other injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E260 E289 E77 E89 RA102 RA60 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1321; 05:04PM; 7635 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B8K05S; Sun Valley; Three story garden style apartment building with fire showing from the 3rd floor, towards the back (Bravo / Charlie corner). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E260 E289 E77 E89 RA102 RA60 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1243; 04:47PM; 2555 E Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uEjYWZ; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The initial 26 responding firefighters (prior to the assignment being filled out to a full brush response) quickly knocked down the fire, holding it to 1/4 acre with no structures damaged. All the additionally added resources are being released and the initial response will remain on scene to conduct mop up and ensure no hot spots remain. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E20 E202 E210 E221 E25 E290 E3 E4 E90 EM1 EM13 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA25 RA90 T10 T2 T21 T9; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Grass Fire; INC#1243; 04:19PM; 2555 E Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uEjYWZ; Boyle Heights; A[proximately 1/4 acre of grass burning uphill. There is one structure exposed at the top of the hill. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E202 E25 T2; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1209; 04:07PM; 4240 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3srrhyM; Vermont Square; Auto versus motorcycle with two patients. One sadly determined deceased on scene (age / gender unknown at this time) and one transported (condition unknown). Any queries regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3083. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; E14 E215 EM11 RA14 RA46 T15; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Power Outage; 01:10PM; DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES; Due to a power outage in the Downtown LA area, the LAFD is responding to a number of 'stuck elevator' and 'automatic fire alarm' calls in numerous buildings in the affected area. These are common occurrences when a building loses power. We have no reports of any injuries. We do not have any information regarding the possible cause of the power outage and all questions are referred to LA DWP. ; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0505; 10:09AM; 2081 N Redcliff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smEqsA; Silver Lake; KNOCKDOWN: Building type updated to a 2 story single family dwelling (with basement but not a hillside structure). 26 firefighters located (26 minutes) a small fire in the furnace room (and ductwork) in the basement. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E211 E220 E56 RA20 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0505; 09:43AM; 2081 N Redcliff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3smEqsA; Silver Lake; Two story hillside (reported as all level ground) with moderate smoke showing from the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E20 E211 E220 E56 RA20 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0975; 02:54PM; 3428 W 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCseJi; Hyde Park; Firefighters have knocked down the bulk of the flames, which were well-developed in the attic space of the one-story home. The fire compromised the roof structure, leaving some hard-to-reach pockets of heat that will require an extended operation to remove debris and fully snuff out all hot spots. It took 41 firefighters 51 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E57 E66 E94 EM13 RA34 RA66 RA894 RA94 SQ21 T66 T94; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0975; 02:03PM; 3428 W 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCseJi; Hyde Park; PRELIM: Fire showing from a one-story, single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E266 E294 E34 E57 E66 E94 RA66 RA894 RA94 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
